name: Hammer Spider
description:
You are a spider who wields a hammer. you live inside a heavily armored robotic warrior, who has been deployed into battle. While the robot can wreck house outside, his armor needs maintenance on the inside. Your job is to run around the inside of the robot, repairing his armor, lest he dies, killing you as well.

Compete with yourself to get a personal best!

Originally made in 48 hours for the 2020 Global Game Jam, you can also find it here.
